statusLine.command: input=$(cat); git_branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then printf "\033[31m*\033[0m\033[32m[%s]\033[0m" "$git_branch"; else printf "\033[32m[%s]\033[0m" "$git_branch"; fi; fi; printf "\033[36m[%s]\033[0m" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|^.*/||')"
